titleNullable: Hand Signs | ASL Hand Sign Data
subtitleNullable: Comprehensive Collection of ASL Hand Signs - Numbers & Alphabets
descriptionNullable: The dataset contains a wide range of ASL hand signs, including letters & numbers, captured in various lighting conditions and camera angles. Each hand sign is labeled with its corresponding ASL symbol, making it easy to use for training and testing machine learning algorithms. With its diverse range of hand signs and high-quality image data, the "Hand Signs | ASL Hand Sign Data" dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers working on applications related to sign language translation, gesture recognition, and human-computer interaction.
title: Hand Signs | ASL Hand Sign Data
subtitle: Comprehensive Collection of ASL Hand Signs - Numbers & Alphabets
description: The dataset contains a wide range of ASL hand signs, including letters & numbers, captured in various lighting conditions and camera angles. Each hand sign is labeled with its corresponding ASL symbol, making it easy to use for training and testing machine learning algorithms. With its diverse range of hand signs and high-quality image data, the "Hand Signs | ASL Hand Sign Data" dataset is a valuable resource for researchers and developers working on applications related to sign language translation, gesture recognition, and human-computer interaction.
